lowerboundmethods

Class SimpleLowerBoundEstimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • lowerboundmethods.AbstractLowerBoundEstimation
      • lowerboundmethods.AbstractLowerBoundEstimationInputForUpperBound
        • lowerboundmethods.SimpleLowerBoundEstimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BermudanSwaptionValueEstimatorInterface, net.finmath.montecarlo.conditionalexpectation.RegressionBasisFunctionsProvider

    public class SimpleLowerBoundEstimation
extends AbstractLowerBoundEstimationInputForUpperBound
implements net.finmath.montecarlo.conditionalexpectation.RegressionBasisFunctionsProvider
    Implements a lower bound estimation of a Bermudan Swaption value which caches values for reuse in upper bound methods.
    Author:
    (c)Christian P. Fries, modified by Lennart Quante
